title: Humanoid Robot
content:
- ### OntologyBlock
  id:: humanoid-robot-ontology
  collapsed:: true
	- ontology:: true
	- term-id:: RB-0004
	- preferred-term:: Humanoid Robot
	- status:: complete
	- public-access:: true
	- definition:: A humanoid robot is a robot whose overall appearance and kinematic structure are based on the human body, typically including a head, torso, two arms, and two legs.
	- source:: [[ISO 8373:2021]]
	- maturity:: mature
	- owl:class:: rb:HumanoidRobot
	- owl:physicality:: PhysicalEntity
	- owl:role:: Object
	- belongsToDomain:: [[Robotics]]

ontology.definition: A humanoid robot is a robot whose overall appearance and kinematic structure are based on the human body, typically including a head, torso, two arms, and two legs.

errors: Missing required property: is-subclass-of (at least one parent class)
